sentences.english: Let the captains of the hosts pierce her with their swords, let them crush her beneath their shields.
sentences.chinese: 讓指揮千軍萬馬的將軍們用劍刺穿她，用盾壓碎她。

sentences.english: And it can also turn them to be generals which command a large number of armies to win the wars.
sentences.chinese: 他們也可以成爲指揮千軍萬馬的將軍來贏得戰爭。

sentences.english: "Painting Mountain" cliff face Jiang standing Pentium wall seems to be a mighty force.
sentences.chinese: “畫山”峭壁面江而立，壁上似有千軍萬馬奔騰。

sentences.english: The slightest stirring of wind online is enough to bring an army of commentators.
sentences.chinese: 網上聽到一點風聲，千軍萬馬便洶湧而來。

sentences.english: No wonder millions of soldiers and civil servants sit in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 難怪這幾年報考公務員的千軍萬馬。
